current.cart-preorder-text: If you have PRE-ORDER item/s within your cart, your order will be placed on hold and shipped altogether when the item/s are back in stock.

settings.col_2_image_1_caption: Clinical observation by scalp technician and aesthetic practitioner Kelly Morrell, 6 weeks usage #1
settings.col_2_image_2_caption: Clinical observation by scalp technician and aesthetic practitioner Kelly Morrell, 6 weeks usage #2
settings.col_3_testimonial: “With the right candidates, I’ve found CALECIM® Advanced Hair System delivers excellent results even in patients who were unresponsive to Minoxidil.”

settings.message_text_1: Enjoy 10% off when you sign up to our email database.

Home
Collections

settings.title: The Future of Beauty
settings.text: Activate restoration with our science-backed innovations.
settings.button_label: Discover CALECIM Skincare and Hair Range

settings.title: MEASURE YOUR RING SIZE WITH A PIECE OF PAPER
settings.content:
Find a strip of paper that is at least 10cm long.
Wrap it around your finger.
Use a pen or maker to mark the point where the end meet.
Lay the paper on the ruler and annotate the measurement in millimetre (mm).
Use the table below to discover your ring size.

settings.title: MEASURE YOUR CURRENT RING
settings.content:
Select a ring that properly fits the intended finger.
Place the ring over the circles below, matching the inside edge of the ring to the circle nearest in size. This measurement refers to the inside diameter of the ring.
If the ring falls between two sizes, order the larger size.

settings.title: Created by Scientists

settings.title: Trusted by Doctors
settings.text: Used in hundreds of clinics around the world to support patient results and recovery

settings.title: Validated by Results
settings.text: Robust clinical data by medical professionals make up the core of our brand. This is why we know CALECIM® works

settings.title: Cancel or adjust your plan anytime
NEVER RUN OUT
settings.text: With MyCALECIM® Auto-Replenish, watch your favorite products show up at your door automatically and save up to 20%. Customize your experience - receive what you need, when you need it, no more or no less.

settings.title: What is PTT-6<sup>®</sup>
settings.text: PTT-6<sup>®</sup> harnesses the body’s natural mechanisms of restoration. It contains over 3,000 proteins, including growth factors, cytokines, and exosomes that to help boost the skin's regenerative response.

settings.title:
“CALECIM® delivers a revolutionary new approach, integrating the healing and regenerative
benefits of the most powerful exosomes and growth factors into a cosmeceutical line.”
settings.author: Dr. Mitchel Goldman
settings.occupation: Double board-certified Dermatologist and pioneer in growth factor skincare

settings.title: “Immediately after a few days of using my skin seemed much firmer and clearer.”
settings.author: @tales.ofskincare

settings.title: “Immediately after a few days of using my skin seemed much firmer and clearer. #2”
settings.author: @tales.ofskincare#2

settings.title: What Makes Us Different
settings.text:
Revitalise from within: PTT-6<sup>®</sup> activates restoration by creating celluar messages to help visibly define and correct facial definition, improve look of skin density and encourage radiance and glow. 

Scientific research has shown that PTT-6<sup>®</sup> penetrates to the deepest layers of the skin to help reduce fine lines and wrinkles and improves the look of skin elasticity and healing. It also helps re-invigorate hair and condition scalp skin to promote denser, thicker and fuller looking hair. 

Your body knows how to be youthful. CALECIM<sup>®</sup> gives it the nudge it needs. Skip the miracles. Embrace the future of beauty.

settings.title: Try the full range of products on us
Be rewarded for referring a friend
MEMBER BENEFITS
settings.text: Join MyCALECIM® Rewards Club now and treat yourself to full-size products, generous discounts, exclusive launch promos and more
